attributes.action: Exempt entrepreneur/managers  from the scrapping of Capital Gains Taper Relief
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to allow exemptions for entrepreneur founders/directors who will be hit hard by the scrapping of taper relief and the 80% increase in tax to the new blanket 18% capital gains tax level.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
